commit message: Revamped how the system tracks and stores columns in a generalized way in order to ensure that we can generate tables for different model objects (e.g. Distance, Receipts, etc) in a generalized way. This properly enables tracking for both CSV and PDF reports.
Updated the report framework
Renamed a preference
Merge branch 'master' into develop
Fixed an issue during which distances get lost when you rename a trip
Merge branch 'master' into develop

Make casing of module names consistent with their folder (#11)

Previously, some module references were capitilised, which their folder
names were not. This causes build issues on case sensitive file systems.
See issue #11 for more information.

This commit fixes the issue by changing module references to use
the casing of their folder
